page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: {Recreation Netherton Cricket Club ( situated in Balk lane ),Netherton Football Club ( The Kestrels ), The Darby and Joan Club,The Netherton and Midgley Womens Institute, All these clubs provide recreational facilities either as spectators or participants. There has been a significent growth in home computers used for leisure activities. There is a video club loaning tapes at the local filling station in Netherton. There are several plots of allotments where local people grow produce and flowers. There are a number local people who grow dahlies and chrysanthumums for competitions locally.
